PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Need an alternative to IDrive?
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Get built-in zero-knowledge encryption with Internxt

descriptions: Not all files on IDrive are protected with end-to-end encryption. IDrive separates file storage from key management, offering end-to-end encryption if you enable a personal key. Default encryption leaves files accessible to the service.

IDrive focuses on backups and versioning. Internxtâ€™s full product suite focuses on securing your files from Big Tech, including Antivirus, VPN, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail, all protected with post-quantum encryption.
IDriveâ€™s servers are located in the US, making it subject to US surveillance and legal access requests. Default encryption can be accessed by the company and government authorities.
Without open source code or audits, you canâ€™t be sure how IDrive handles your data. Choosing a European cloud storage provider that is fully open source like Internxt gives you verified protection.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Alternative to IDrive
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: Find out why you need an alternative to IDrive, and get post-quantum encrypted cloud storage, plus Antivirus, VPN, Cleaner, Meet, and more with Internxt.

descriptions: Unlike IDrive, Internxt provides zero-knowledge encryption for every single file automatically, ensuring only you hold the keys to your data.
Internxt gives you more than just backups; you get a suite of tools like VPN and Antivirus designed to protect your entire digital life.
Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine on GitHub. This transparency guarantees no vulnerabilities or backdoors are hidden.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs IDrive
VersusSection.description: Internxt plans include the most modern, secure, and advanced zero-knowledge encryption for all files and an extensive product suite.

inxtTable.title: Internxt: Total privacy, transparency, and privacy suite

features.title: Open source and audited
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine and ensure its security via our GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Encryption
features.description: Your data is automatically encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it.

features.title: Multiple compliance standards
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Multiple lifetime plans for up to 5TB, including access to VPN, Meet, Cleaner, and more. Access these services forever for {{discount}}% off.

features.title: Closed source, no audit
features.description: IDrive keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how it handles your data.

features.title: Encryption
features.description: You have to set up the encryption process yourself by choosing from three options, meaning it's not always private by default.

features.title: Compliance
features.description: United States compliance laws apply, which could give governments access to your files if a subpoena is requested.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: No lifetime plans available. 2TB plans are available for monthly, annual, or bi-annual plans only.

descriptions: Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your Internxt Drive app for full control and protection against malware, ransomware, and spyware.
Internxtâ€™s VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private. Surf securely knowing your personal information is protected.
Internxt Cleaner helps you identify and eliminate unwanted junk or duplicate files from your device to keep your storage organized and efficient.
Internxt Meet is your secure alternative to Teams. Host private video calls protected with post-quantum encryption, free from trackers and data collection.
Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile. Internxt also offers S3 storage plans at a low cost of â‚¬7/TB/month and support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure alternative to IDrive?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. All your files are protected by default without the need for separate vaults.
Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, NAS support, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative to IDrive.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your data protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict EU laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is IDrive more expensive than Internxt?
answer: IDrive costs up to â‚¬69.95 annually for 5TB. With Internxt, you can get 5TB of post-quantum encrypted storage plus the full privacy suite for {{percentage}}% off for the first year.
You can also avoid subscription costs by choosing a lifetime Internxt plan to get full privacy forever, an option IDrive does not offer.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards, PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
